# Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a modern business website for J&F Development built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 16 (App Router)
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Package Manager**: npm

## Code Style Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components and pages
- Follow React best practices with functional components and hooks
- Use Tailwind CSS utility classes for styling
- Implement responsive design (mobile-first approach)
- Use semantic HTML elements
- Ensure accessibility (ARIA labels, alt text, etc.)

## Project Structure
- `/src/app` - Application pages and layouts using App Router
- `/src/components` - Reusable React components
- `/public` - Static assets (images, fonts, etc.)

## Best Practices
- Keep components small and focused
- Use Server Components by default, Client Components when needed
- Optimize images using Next.js Image component
- Follow SEO best practices with metadata
- Ensure fast performance and Core Web Vitals
